name: PUNARUTHAN VOLUNTARY ORGANISATION
briefDescription: PUNARUTHAN has been established in 1998 and came to the frontline in the year 1999 supercyclone. During Cyclone our volunteers actively involved in rescue and rehabilitation programme. We have safely escorted ANC & older person to Cyclone shelter and distributed drinking water with dry food. PUNARUTHAN has rewarded “ The Best Youth organisation “ for its outstanding activities in various development activities in the rural area .The organizations was involved in preparing youth to fight against corruptions, linkage establishment with the youth clubs and helping the distress and poor people. PUNARUTHAN Voluntary Organisation is united in hopes with struggling humanity of today.
